pageContext.claim: “Since our tax cuts and regulation cuts, American companies have brought nearly $1 trillion back to our shores -- money that could never have come back...Over a trillion -- actually, it's now over a trillion dollars.”
pageContext.analysis: Companies brought back $664.9 billion for full year 2018, according to the Commerce Department, far short of the $4 trillion Trump routinely claimed would come back because of the tax cut.
